description:
Certificate of Lawfulness for conversion of single dwelling house to three flats (existing). 

 APPLICANTS' PLAN NOS.:  Land Registry document dated 11th                         May, 1999, London Electricity bills                         dated 17th March, 1998, 17th May,                         1998, 11th August, 1998, 25th                         August, 1998, 1st December, 1998,                         10th November, 1998, 8th August,                         1999, 10th February, 1999/British                         Gas bills dated 5th May, 1998, 5th                         July, 1998, 26th October, 1998,                         Thames Water 30th October, 1998,                         British Telecom bill dated 29th                         October, 1998.  Television Licence                         dated 11th July, 1998, 30th June,                         2000, Gas bill dated 14th July,                         1999, 9th February, 2000.  British                         Telecom bill dated 8th July, 1999;                         10th January, 2000 and 8th July,                         1998 and Electricity bill 30th                         April, 1999.
decision_conditions: The conversion of the property into three self-contained flats and use as three single dwellings began more than four years ago before the date of this application.
